title: Krazy Ken Watches WWDC 2018 Keynote - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Krazy Ken Watches WWDC 2018 Keynote - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Apple's WWDC 2018 keynote recently kicked off, and Krazy Ken is going to show you how he preps, and he'll give his colorful, over-exaggerated commentary as Apple's presenters take stage.  Want more videos like this?   Check out Software Showcase   Subscribe for new content!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #55 - Krazy Ken Watches WWDC 2018 Keynote  Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.
